summary: Going into Good Omens (2019) I was not prepared for Michael Sheen and now I need to watch more of his films (I’ve only seen him...
body: Going into Good Omens (2019) I was not prepared for Michael Sheen and now I need to watch more of his films (I’ve only seen him in Twilight before). Don’t know where to start though so if anyone has any recommendations I would be glad to hear them.

reblog.comment: Going into Good Omens (2019) I was not prepared for Michael Sheen and now I need to watch more of his films (I’ve only seen him in Twilight before). Don’t know where to start though so if anyone has any recommendations I would be glad to hear them.

trail.content_raw: Going into Good Omens (2019) I was not prepared for Michael Sheen and now I need to watch more of his films (I’ve only seen him in Twilight before). Don’t know where to start though so if anyone has any recommendations I would be glad to hear them.

tags: i'm sorry i have a lot of feelings about this
summary:
headcanon that this bleach, dead looking blonde isn't aziraphale's natural hair.
that, as heaven's only agent on earth, he's...
body:
headcanon that this bleach, dead looking blonde isn’t aziraphale’s natural hair.

that, as heaven’s only agent on earth, he’s been trying to look the most stereotypical angel ever since he was assigned the job. to, y'know, drive more people towards the light.

after everything is over, after the apocalypse is cancelled and their clever little trick with the body swap works, crowley makes a comment. it’s nothing, really, just a quick “how do you go around all day like that, your hair feels like dry grass. that can’t be comfortable, i mean” that he immediately drops the next second to talk about an entirely different topic

but as aziraphale checks himself in the mirror some time later, casually thinking he should probably get it bleached again, he remembers crowley’s words and realizes “actually, why should i bother”

so he lets the roots grow a little more, then cuts the bleached part off and it’s… weird, (the first time crowley sees him with the new haircut he almost has a stroke and can’t stop staring uncomfortably at his head for the next couple of days). it feels weird, he’s not used to keeping his hair that short. he could technically miracle the whole process done but he feels it wouldn’t be the same, he'snever been one to rush things.

but when it starts to really grow back, it’s absolutely beautiful. it’s healthy and it’s lustrous, it glows in the warm sussex sun of their little cottage and it’s dark and so fucking soft that crowley could spend the rest of his eternity just dragging his fingers through those curls

and sometimes the curls get a little grayer than usual and aziraphale looks… softer. older perhaps and maybe, just maybe, a little too human. but that’s okay.

they’re okay. they earned it.

just,, aziraphale with michael sheen’s curls, man

summary: I somehow ended up on your blog last night and drunk me was adamant about finding THAT moment from There's Something About...
question: I somehow ended up on your blog last night and drunk me was adamant about finding THAT moment from There's Something About Movies just because for some bizarre reason I "knew" it would be on your blog. It was all to show some possibly imaginary person how Michael Sheen and that look was ruining my life. Anyway, your blog is a blessing!
answer: Ajsnajsnaj I take it that you found it. I gotta get better at tagging stuff but I’ve been good about the michael sheen tag (at least in my posts, not so much on reblogs). Glad you enjoy the mess that is my blog, and also thank you

reblog.comment: Ajsnajsnaj I take it that you found it. I gotta get better at tagging stuff but I’ve been good about the michael sheen tag (at least in my posts, not so much on reblogs). Glad you enjoy the mess that is my blog, and also thank you

blog.name: deadlightcircus
blog.title: semi-hiatus
blog.description:
on semi-hiatus until further notice.

vikki.
28.
somewhere but not here.
she/they.
tv/film aficionado.
gamer.
certified dumbass.
trash personified.
industrial + synthwave fiend.
ineffably in love with aziraphale and crowley.
arthur morgan is no.1 best boah in the west.

multi-fandom + multi-everything that takes my fancy really. my blog has never had a concrete theme or focus, so what you see is what you get.
sideblogs? what sideblogs?? we dump everything on main like men!

there's always a goddamn train heist.
there's always a plan.
there's always tahiti.
- van der linde gang proverb

byf: terfs, racists, pedophiles (+ map apologists), homophobes... y'all ain't nothin' more than horse dung scraped from the heel of my boot. ya ain't welcome here. now get the hell outta dodge!!

occasionally nsfw. please blacklist the tags 'nsfw', 'nsfw text', and 'nudity' if you don't wish to see such content on your dash. THIS BLOG IS NOW CATHOLIC TUMBLR APPROVED. ALL FEMALE PRESENTING NIPPLES WILL BE FLAGGED ON SIGHT!

summary: I keep on getting Michael Sheen and Charlie Sheen messed up because of a bloody Kraftklub song.  “So wie Charlie Sheen, uns...
body:
I keep on getting Michael Sheen and Charlie Sheen messed up because of a bloody Kraftklub song.

“So wie Charlie Sheen, uns fragen sie:“Warum wollt ihr eigentlich nicht nach Berlin?"”

Why does Michael Sheen not want to go to Berlin? It fits so well!! Ahhhh!
